name: FilterMinder
0:
”Alexa, tell Filter Minder that I just changed my filter.”
”Alexa, tell Filter Minder that I replaced my filter.”
”Alexa, ask Filter Minder when I last changed my filter.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: filter minder
des: Air conditioner filters should be changed often to improve air quality and keep everything running efficiently. Now you can save and recall the last time you replaced your air conditioner filter so you are never in doubt.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
